name: Madarao Ski Resort
description: Madarao Kogen Ski Resort, nestled between Myoko Kogen and Nozawa Onsen, offers generous snowfall, exceptional tree skiing, and off-piste opportunities. This mid-sized resort features 30 courses, 9 lifts, and a 440-meter vertical drop. Madarao has a lot to offer for all skill levels, with some challenging black runs, an ungroomed terrain park, and a playful tree skiing area. The resort's northern aspect ensures excellent powder conditions.
